name: arterial
content:
arterial adjective
(IN BODY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
related to or flowing in an artery (= a tube carrying blood from the heart to other parts of the body): the arterial walls arterial blood
More examplesFewer examplesHe had a significant arterial blockage.She was in hospital following an arterial embolism.The drug is used to treat pulmonary arterial hypertension.

arterial adjective
(ROUTE)
An arterial route is an important one that a lot of traffic moves along. : arterial roads
More examplesFewer examplesToo many of the state's highways and major arterial roads are in poor condition.76 percent of arterial streets are congested in the San Francisco-Oakland area.This is one of the two main arterial routes into the city centre.
